# Semester Calendar & Key Dates {.unnumbered}



```{r}
library(kableExtra)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
dt <- mtcars[1:5, 1:6]

kbl(dt) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped", font_size = 7) %>%
  row_spec(1, bold = T) %>%
  row_spec(2, bold = T, color = "white", background = "green") %>%
  column_spec(2:6, width = "2em")

```

```{r}

kbl(dt) %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped", font_size = 7) %>%
  row_spec(1, bold = T) %>%
  row_spec(2, bold = T, color = "white", background = "black") %>%
  column_spec(2:6, width = "2em")

```

```{r}

kbl(dt) %>%
```
